verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H4480>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> waxed <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for their <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and for their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in age: <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H859>ye<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you; <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> that hath <S%H3898>fought<s%> for you.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have divided unto you by <S%H5307>lot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> to be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3996>westward.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1920>expel<s%> them from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and <S%H3423>drive<s%> them from out of your <S%H4480>sight;<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> unto you.

Be ye therefore <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>courageous<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that ye <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4480>therefrom<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left;<s%>

That ye <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> among <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among you; <S%H3808>neither<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> cause to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> bow <S%H7812>yourselves<s%> unto them:
But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath driven <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>strong:<s%> but as for <S%H859>you,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> hath been able to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> it is that <S%H3898>fighteth<s%> for you, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> you.
Take <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> therefore unto <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> that ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Else <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye do in any wise go <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> and <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and shall make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with them, and go <S%H935>in<s%> unto them, and <S%H1992>they<s%> to you:

Know for a <S%H3045>certainty<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> any <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%> and <S%H4170>traps<s%> unto you, and <S%H7850>scourges<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and <S%H6976>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> ye <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and ye <S%H3045>know<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> hath <S%H5307>failed<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you; <S%H3605>all<s%> are come to <S%H935>pass<s%> unto you, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> hath <S%H5307>failed<s%> <S%H4480>thereof.<s%>

Therefore it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H413><s%> you; <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

When ye have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and have <S%H1980>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>yourselves<s%> to them; then shall the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and ye shall <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> unto you.
